meanings.sent1: After the spill, she recleaned the floor thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: The room looked much better after it was recleaned.
meanings.sent3: He recleaned the dishes, but they still looked dirty!
meanings.sent4: The recleaned windows sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The recleaned car interior smelled fresh and inviting.

meanings.sent1: She recleaned the kitchen after the party.
meanings.sent2: The maid recleaned the hotel room to perfection.
meanings.sent3: He recleaned his shoes before the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: The recleaned carpet felt soft and fluffy underfoot.
meanings.sent5: The recleaned clothes looked as good as new.
